template.template: SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0
template.name: SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0
template.description: Contacts: saftehnika.com, techsupport@saftehnika.com. Advanced template for SAF radio Integra-W

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/FWversion)<>last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/FWversion,#2)
trigger.name: FW changed

trigger.expression: max(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/icmpping,#3)=0
trigger.name: Unavailable by ICMP ping
trigger.description: Last three attempts returned timeout. Please check device connectivity.

trigger.expression: min(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/icmppingloss,5m)>{$ICMP_LOSS_WARN} and min(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/icmppingloss,5m)<100
trigger.name: High ICMP ping loss

dependency.name: Unavailable by ICMP ping
dependency.expression: max(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/icmpping,#3)=0

trigger.expression: avg(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/icmppingsec,5m)>{$ICMP_RESPONSE_TIME_WARN}
trigger.name: High ICMP ping response time

dependency.name: High ICMP ping loss
dependency.expression: min(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/icmppingloss,5m)>{$ICMP_LOSS_WARN} and min(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/icmppingloss,5m)<100

dependency.name: Unavailable by ICMP ping
dependency.expression: max(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/icmpping,#3)=0

trigger.expression: (last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraWifPortAdminStatus_LAN,#1)<>last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraWifPortAdminStatus_LAN,#2))=1
trigger.name: LAN port administrative status changed

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraWifPortAdminStatus_LAN)=2
trigger.name: LAN port disable

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraWifPortAdminStatus_LAN3)=2
trigger.name: LAN3 port disabled

trigger.expression: (last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraWifPortAdminStatus_MNG,#1)<>last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraWifPortAdminStatus_MNG,#2))=1
trigger.name: MNG port administrative status changed

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraWifPortAdminStatus_MNG)=2
trigger.name: MNG port disabled

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraWifPortOperStatus_LAN)=2
trigger.name: LAN port DOWN

dependency.name: LAN port disable
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraWifPortAdminStatus_LAN)=2

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraWifPortOperStatus_LAN3)=2
trigger.name: LAN3 Port down

dependency.name: LAN3 port disabled
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraWifPortAdminStatus_LAN3)=2

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraWifPortOperStatus_MNG)=2
trigger.name: MNG port DOWN

dependency.name: MNG port disabled
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraWifPortAdminStatus_MNG)=2

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraWmodemSyncLoss)<>1
trigger.name: Modem synchronization loss

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraWradioTxMute)=1 or last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraWradioTxMute)=3
trigger.recovery_expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraWradioTxMute)=2
trigger.name: Tx muted

item.name: LAN Rx throughput
item.description: Rx bitrate averaged for last minute

item.name: MNG Rx throughput
item.description: Rx bitrate averaged for last minute

item.name: WAN Rx throughput
item.description: Rx bitrate averaged for last minute, FOR OUTBAND FW

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraWrxDroppedLAN)>last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraWrxDroppedLAN)
trigger.name: LAN port dropping Rx packets

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraWrxDroppedMNG)>last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraWrxDroppedMNG)
trigger.name: MNG port dropping Rx packets

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraWrxDropWAN)>last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraWrxDropWAN)
trigger.name: WAN port dropping Rx packets

item.name: Link Rx throughput
item.description: Link Rx bitrate averaged for last minute, FOR OUTBAND FW

item.name: Link Tx throughput
item.description: Link Rx bitrate averaged for last minute, FOR OUTBAND FW

item.name: LAN Tx throughput
item.description: Tx bitrate averaged for last minute

item.name: MNG Tx throughput
item.description: Tx bitrate averaged for last minute

item.name: WAN Tx throughput
item.description: Rx bitrate averaged for last minute, FOR OUTBAND FW

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraWtxDroppedLAN)>last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraWtxDroppedLAN)
trigger.name: LAN port dropping Tx packets

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraWtxDroppedMNG)>last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraWtxDroppedMNG)
trigger.name: MNG port dropping Tx packets

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraWtxDropWAN)>last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraWtxDropWAN)
trigger.name: WAN port dropping Tx packets

trigger.expression: change(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/radioSN)=1
trigger.name: Radio HW changed

item.name: ACM Engine status
item.description: ACM engine status

item.name: Data Acquire status
item.description: This is the current status of modem data acquire when queried modem status.

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWmodemAcquireStatus)=3
trigger.recovery_expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWmodemAcquireStatus)=2
trigger.name: Modem Acquire Status Failed

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWmodemAcquireStatus)=1
trigger.name: Modem Acquire Status in Progress

item.name: Bandwidth
item.description: Signal bandwidth

item.name: FEC load
item.description: Decoder stress or FEC load value

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWmodemFECload)={$FECLOADMAX}
trigger.name: FEC load increased

dependency.name: Modem Acquire Status Failed
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWmodemAcquireStatus)=3
dependency.recovery_expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWmodemAcquireStatus)=2

dependency.name: PLL status ERROR
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWradioPLL)=1
dependency.recovery_expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWradioPLL)=2

item.name: Maximal configured modulation $1
item.description: Modem profile chosen by user

item.name: Signal quality
item.description: Current radial MSE value

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWmodemRadialMse)<={$SIGQUAL}
trigger.name: Signal quality low alarm

dependency.name: Modem Acquire Status Failed
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWmodemAcquireStatus)=3
dependency.recovery_expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWmodemAcquireStatus)=2

dependency.name: PLL status ERROR
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWradioPLL)=1
dependency.recovery_expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWradioPLL)=2

item.name: Modem capacity Rx
item.description: Rx ethernet current capacity in kilobits per second

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWmodemRxCapacity)<>last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWmodemRxCapacity,#2)
trigger.name: Modulation changed

item.name: Modulation Rx actual
item.description: Current (actual) Rx Modulation

item.name: Modem capacity Tx
item.description: Tx ethernet current capacity in kilobits per second

item.name: Modulation Tx actual
item.description: Current (actual) Tx Modulation

item.name: PLL status
item.description: PLL state of local-oscillator generator

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWradioPLL)=1
trigger.recovery_expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWradioPLL)=2
trigger.name: PLL status ERROR

trigger.expression: between(last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWradioRxLevel),{$RXLEVMIN},{$RXLEVMAX})=0
trigger.name: Rx level out of range

dependency.name: Modem Acquire Status Failed
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWmodemAcquireStatus)=3
dependency.recovery_expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWmodemAcquireStatus)=2

dependency.name: PLL status ERROR
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWradioPLL)=1
dependency.recovery_expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWradioPLL)=2

item.name: Rx Level state
item.description: Received signal level state

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWradioRxLevelState)<>1
trigger.recovery_expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWradioRxLevelState)=1
trigger.name: Rx level status alarm

dependency.name: Modem Acquire Status Failed
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWmodemAcquireStatus)=3
dependency.recovery_expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWmodemAcquireStatus)=2

dependency.name: PLL status ERROR
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWradioPLL)=1
dependency.recovery_expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWradioPLL)=2

item.name: Radio side
item.description: Radio side:Low/High

trigger.expression: between(last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWradioTemperature),{$TEMPMIN},{$TEMPMAX80})=0
trigger.name: Radio temperature out of range!

trigger.expression: between(last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWradioTemperature),{$TEMPMIN},{$TEMPMAX100})=0
trigger.name: System CPU temperature out of range

trigger.expression: between(last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWsysBoardTemperature),{$TEMPMIN},{$TEMPMAX100})=0
trigger.name: System temperature out of range

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWsysLicenseGenStatus)=4
trigger.name: License unlimited

trigger.expression: between(last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWsysPSUcurrent),{$PSUCURRMIN},{$PSUCURRMAX})=0
trigger.name: PSU current alarm

trigger.expression: between(last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWsysPSUpower),{$PSUPOWMIN},{$PSUPOWMAX})=0
trigger.name: PSU power alarm

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/sysUpTime)<15m
trigger.name: Radio was restarted

trigger.expression: max(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/zabbix[host,snmp,available],{$SNMP.TIMEOUT})=0
trigger.name: No SNMP data collection

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWsysLicenseExpire)<=1209600 or last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWsysLicenseGenStatus)=2
trigger.recovery_expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWsysLicenseExpire)>1209600 or last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWsysLicenseGenStatus)=1
trigger.name: License will expire or expired

dependency.name: License unlimited
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWsysLicenseGenStatus)=4

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWmodemRxModulation)<>last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWmodemModulation) or last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWmodemTxModulation)<>last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWmodemModulation)
trigger.recovery_expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWmodemRxModulation)=last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWmodemModulation) and last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWmodemTxModulation)=last(/SAF BASIC Integra-W template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWmodemModulation)
trigger.name: Link modulation drop
